content: to start the project I just picked up a plaque and a craft store sanded it down
painted it white and you can see a little bit of detail on there I painted
subs ads as well as a trooper but what I what the important thing is here I did I
put some water on it and then just dip some colors into the water just let it
bleed and swirl on to the the plaque so it would give an interesting background
to this now here we go I painted the whole thing up you can see I've got the
trooper painted against his back against the wall here sorry I have the sideways
it's just easier to show it instead of straight up since it's a long piece I've
got the trooper back against the wall and that a couples Ed's coming up and
you can see that's that swirling effect the bleeding I did in the background I
think that really came out fun now the the top saying there I use a piece of
paper just paying it up with some acrylic paints and punched a couple
holes in it with a hole punch and then painting them all bloody to give it at
some extra gore now this next one here it's all finished up I've glossed it for
a nice effect and sealing it I gonna flip it here so you can see the you know
the difference the gloss and you can see the picture a little better there but
yeah so there we go there is the hand-painted plaque already
